SELECT a.employment_id, a.emp_task_id, a.company_id, a.employee_id, c.archive_place, c.archive_source as doc_from, c.reserved_archive_type as doc_type, c.reserved_archive_no as doc_num, c.archive_advance_id FROM am_employment a LEFT JOIN am_emp_employee b ON a.emp_task_id = b.emp_task_id LEFT JOIN am_archive_advance c on c.employee_idcard_no = b.id_num and c.employee_name= b.employee_name and c.status = 1
#{item}

SELECT c.luyong_handle_end, COUNT(*) as count FROM am_emp_task a LEFT JOIN am_employment b on a.emp_task_id = b.emp_task_id LEFT JOIN am_archive c ON b.employment_id = c.employment_id LEFT JOIN am_resign f ON f.employment_id = b.employment_id LEFT JOIN emp_employee d on a.employee_id = d.employee_id LEFT JOIN am_emp_task w on f.emp_task_id = w.emp_task_id LEFT JOIN am_emp_custom h on h.emp_task_id = a.emp_task_id LEFT JOIN am_company_set cs on cs.company_id = a.company_id where 1= 1
and ${plid}

SELECT a.job, COUNT(*) as count FROM am_emp_task a LEFT JOIN am_employment b on a.emp_task_id = b.emp_task_id LEFT JOIN am_archive c ON b.employment_id = c.employment_id LEFT JOIN am_resign f ON f.employment_id = b.employment_id LEFT JOIN emp_employee d on a.employee_id = d.employee_id LEFT JOIN am_emp_task w on f.emp_task_id = w.emp_task_id LEFT JOIN am_emp_custom h on h.emp_task_id = a.emp_task_id LEFT JOIN am_company_set cs on cs.company_id = a.company_id where 1= 1
and ${plid}
